title: Hmcl启动游戏报错，但游戏正常运行
author: 化丶冰
txt_content:
如题

错误代码如下


[18:04:18] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.7.8.42
  Time: 2017-09-23 18:04:18
  Thread: Thread[ProcessMonitor,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException: Task java.util.concurrent.FutureTask@57166082 rejected from java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor@1214f404[Terminated, pool size = 0, active threads = 0, queued tasks = 0, completed tasks = 366]

    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$AbortPolicy.rejectedExecution(Unknown Source)

    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.reject(Unknown Source)

    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.execute(Unknown Source)

    at java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService.submit(Unknown Source)

    at java.util.concurrent.Executors$DelegatedExecutorService.submit(Unknown Source)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.newLogLine(Log4jHandler.java:115)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.ui.LaunchingUIDaemon$PrintlnProcessor.accept(LaunchingUIDaemon.java:183)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.ui.LaunchingUIDaemon$PrintlnProcessor.accept(LaunchingUIDaemon.java:166)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.api.event.EventHandler.fire(EventHandler.java:59)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessThread.println(ProcessThread.java:97)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessThread.run(ProcessThread.java:80)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64), 10.0
  Java Version: 1.8.0_144, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
请无视此错误……
我猜你是开了较新版本Forge吧，这些Forge自带了一个加载界面，在MC启动时会带一个假的crash-report，估计这个让HMCL以为你MC崩了，就这样（测试了好几遍）
解决办法：
1.换旧的HMCL
2.找到\config\splash.properties用记事本打开，把enabled后面的true换false
其实这个假崩溃报告已经说明了他的真实身份：（看那个大写的句子就知道）
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 17-9-23 下午8:40
Description: Loading screen debug info

This is just a prompt for computer specs to be printed. THIS IS NOT A ERROR


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.10
        Operating System: Windows 8.1 (amd64) version 6.3
        Java Version: 1.8.0_91, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 127048704 bytes (121 MB) / 197132288 bytes (188 MB) up to 1073741824 bytes (1024 MB)
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx1024m
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: 
        GL info: ' Vendor: 'NVIDIA Corporation' Version: '4.5.0 NVIDIA 353.82' Renderer: 'GeForce 820M/PCIe/SSE2'复制代码

replies.author: 萦然
replies.txt_content:
错误的原因 请一个一个地排除
1.java路径设置错误
2.java版本过旧 请使用java8
3.未安装java
